name: unity_2_theme_builder
description: A package of utilities used to theme our site

scripts.scss-dev-communityrelations: mkdir -p $npm_package_config_communityrelations_dir/css && node-sass --source-map true --source-comments true --source-map-contents true --output-style expanded $npm_package_config_communityrelations_dir/src/scss/ -o $npm_package_config_communityrelations_dir/css/
